name: Krampus Lair
description:
Description :

“You got captured by Krampus who brought you to his hideout in the mountains…

Collect Crystals in the mine and get items from the GOOD elves to escape.

But there are also BAD elves…

They EXPLODE when they see you so be careful! They could attract Krampus!

Don't get caught and take the Elevator to come back home!”

Content :

In this game, you will have 10 mine layouts available to play. Try and get the best score possible in every levels! (it’s really hard but it is possible)

Find the 5 Elves in the mine and give them crystals to get rewards and then escape.

You will also have access to a Level Editor to create your own mine layout and then play in it! (so cool)

I hope you will like this game!

Items :

Primary Items List :

  • Crystals
  • Elevator Caller
  • Krampus Key
  • Gingerbread Key

Secondary Items List :

  • Dark Elves Essence
  • Santa Plush
  • Candy Cane
Controls :

WASD : Move Around

Left Shift : Run

Left Mouse Button : Interact with Elves, Objects, Krampus...

C : Call the Elevator when you have the right Item

Updates :

Update 1.1 : Small game optimization and added a Quality Settings.

Update 1.11 : Added a minimap on top right corner of the screen for the Player to know where he is!

Update 1.2 : More chance to have decorations, Krampus goes around you in the mine and not a total random spot (in a certain radius), Crystals and Elves make sounds so you can hear them in the cave and have a direction.
